headline: Mondelez expands voluntary recall of Chips Ahoy Baked Bites Brookie in U.S.
summary: Mondelez (MDLZ) announced an expansion of its December 24 voluntary recall in the United States of Chips Ahoy Baked Bites Brookie. This expansion includes one additional code date and two additional UPCs of product pouches inside the recalled carton units of Chips Ahoy Baked Bites Brookie, the company stated.Claim 70% Off TipRanks This Holiday SeasonUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis
